Hey, fellow Ella user!

Congratulations, your Ella installation is working, let's add some stuff.

Showing this page means, you haven't defined any categories so far. Next steps are:

  • If you haven't enabled admin yet, do it. If you don't know how, find it out in Django docs.
  • Go the admin page on /admin/.
  • Create some categories to start with in Category administration.

You're seeing this message because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file and you haven't created any categories. Get to work!
